description: This maple and balsamic-glazed roast leg of lamb will become the centre of attention this Christmas. Colourful and cooked to perfection, is it any wonder?
name: Balsamic-Glazed Lamb With Green Olive Tapenade Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 230g pitted Sicilian olives, drained, finely chopped
0.5 cup Woolworths extra virgin olive oil

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 200째C/180째C fan-forced. Place lamb in a baking dish. Pour 1 cup water over base of dish. Combine maple syrup and glaze in a small bowl. Baste lamb with one third of the maple glaze. Bake for 15 minutes or until lamb starts to brown.

Reduce oven to 180째C/160째C fan-forced. Bake lamb, basting with remaining maple glaze every 15 minutes, for 1 hour for medium or until cooked to your liking. Transfer to a plate, cover loosely with foil and rest for 10 minutes
Meanwhile, reserve a few parsley leaves. Finely chop remaining parsley. Combine chopped parsley, olives, capers, oil and lemon juice in a small bowl. Season with pepper.
Top lamb with a little of the olive tapenade and scatter over reserved parsley leaves. Serve with remaining olive tapenade.
